name: Travelo : Notion Travel Planner template
description: Your story will never run out of pages ever'Travel Planner Notion Template:Get ready to take travel planning to the next level with Notion. Travelo helps you to turn your travel bucket list into a bulletproof action plan and help you manage all your adventures in single common workspace. It organizes your bucket lists from scratch and helps you to convert them into the most cherishable memory. It will be the most valuable asset to your existing notion workspace if you a traveller or someone who
features: Upcoming trip dashboard; Bucket List Manager; Plan Things to do; Plan places to visit; Plan Accommodation; Plan Transportation; Itenary Management; Packing List; Expense tracker On-trip and Pre-trip
